channel.title: Connection issue - InsidiaX (PI)
channel.description:
I can't connect to the server using the public IP. (I'm not using NO-IP)
I have checked the ports are open, which they are.
Runelocus server status checker also says the server is online with the IP and Port I used in client.java & gui.java
Yes, I've compiled etc.
I'm completely out of ideas.
Please help.

item.title: Connection issue - InsidiaX (PI)
item.dc:creator: @morbid250 morbid250
item.description:
@morbid250 wrote:

Because I don’t want to. No-ip only masks the public IP anyway, so it won’t affect the connecting to the server.

Read full topic

item.description:
